additional_information: reaction_condition: reaction_temperature:room temperature;    reaction_ph:8.0;    reaction_other_conditions:20 µM myoglobin variant (catalyst), 10 mM sodium dithionite (Na2S2O4), 10 mM triphenylphosphine (PPh3) or triphenylarsine (AsPh3), 12 hours reaction time, anaerobic conditions;    reaction_substrate_concentration:10 mM each (1a and 2a)
